article.title: Haeuptle, Gillam Appointed to DCMO Positions
article.author: Beverly Schaeffer

tags.tag: Office of the Deputy Chief Management Officer

article.text: Andrew S. Haeuptle has been assigned director, business integration, Office of the Deputy Chief Management Officer (DCMO), Washington, D.C., and Mary M. Gillam has been assigned director, technology and innovation, DCMO.
